## Introduction

Here we can add a description of the analysis. 

## Load packages

We can load some packages we need.

```{r load-pkg}
suppressPackageStartupMessages({
    library(dplyr)
    library(ggplot2)
})
```

## Analysis

And then we do some analysis

```{r plot-penguins}
ggplot(penguins, aes(x = flipper_len, y = bill_len, color = species)) + 
    geom_point() + 
    theme_bw()
```
